# Pull Request

## What This Changes

Clear description of what this PR does.

## Why

Why is this change needed? What problem does it solve?

## Type of Change

- [ ] Documentation fix (typo, clarity, examples)
- [ ] New example
- [ ] Syntax change (requires discussion first!)
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Other: ___

## Testing

For syntax changes:
- [ ] Tested with Claude in real project
- [ ] Verified no markdown conflicts
- [ ] Updated SKILL.md
- [ ] Updated README.md
- [ ] Updated CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] Added examples

For documentation:
- [ ] Checked formatting
- [ ] Verified links work
- [ ] Examples are clear

## Breaking Changes

- [ ] No breaking changes
- [ ] Breaking changes (describe migration path below)

Migration path: ___

Fixes #___ (if applicable)
